description: Deletes a resource server. After you delete a resource server, users can no longer generate access tokens with scopes that are associate with that resource server. Resource servers are associated with custom scopes and machine-to-machine (M2M) authorization. For more information, see Access control with resource servers.

parameters.name: UserPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the user pool where you want to delete the resource server.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource server that you want to delete.
